Topic.Title: recovering save game from local storage

Posts.EditableText: Hi there, is it possible to retrieve my saves from local storage?  When I browse the storage inspector in firefox, I think I found the saves under "Local Storage" and connected to iplayif.com -- but does anyone have experience finding and extracting the quetzal save states?  is it possible?
Posts.HTML: Hi there, is it possible to retrieve my saves from local storage? When I browse the storage inspector in firefox, I think I found the saves under "Local Storage" and connected to iplayif.com -- but does anyone have experience finding and extracting the quetzal save states? is it possible?
